# Add Issue Attachment

# Description

Add an attachment to an issue in Jira.

# Untitled Section

# Configuration

* 
* Issue ID or key - The issue you wish to add an attachment to. Enter the full issue key, such as ABCD-1234, or the issue ID. You can also use the dropdown list to search for an issue. This field supports String type input.
* Attachment - Click to use a variable. This field supports IResource type input.









* Attachment ID - The ID of the attachment. Automatically generated output variable.
* Attachment - Automatically generated output variable.
